name: MetaShare
description: Web-based tool for collaborating on Salesforce projects

DJANGO_ALLOWED_HOSTS.description: Heroku proxies web requests and Django needs to be configured to allow the forwards

DJANGO_ADMIN_URL.description: The url path to the admin section of the site

ADMIN_API_ALLOWED_SUBNETS.description: Comma-separated list of IPv4 networks which will have Django admin access

DJANGO_SECRET_KEY.description: A secret key used to provide cryptographic signing

DJANGO_HASHID_SALT.description: Salt used to hash IDs that get exposed publicly

DB_ENCRYPTION_KEY.description: A key for encrypting using cryptography.fernet. Generate using cryptography.fernet.Fernet.generate_key

GITHUB_CLIENT_ID.description: Client ID for a GitHub App.

GITHUB_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Client secret for a GitHub App.

SF_CALLBACK_URL.description: Callback URL for Salesforce Connected App (e.g. "https://<...>/accounts/salesforce/login/callback/")

SF_CLIENT_ID.description: Consumer Key for Salesforce Connected App

SF_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Consumer Secret for Salesforce Connected App

SF_CLIENT_KEY.description: RSA private key matching digital certificate on Salesforce Connected App
